sentences.en: A nicotine spray can help smokers quit the habit without putting on weight.
sentences.cn: 尼古丁喷雾剂能够帮助吸烟者在不增加体重的同时戒烟。

sentences.en: After about three months, I was no longer addicted to nicotine.
sentences.cn: 大约3个月后，我就不再对尼古丁上瘾了。

sentences.en: Both nicotine and carbon monoxide inhaled with cigarette smoking have been incriminated as causative factors.
sentences.cn: 抽烟时吸入的尼古丁和一氧化碳都已经被标定为致病因素。
咖啡因和尼古丁是刺激物质.

sentences.en: Dixon said, grateful for nicotine and support of Margaret.
sentences.cn: 狄克逊说着, 对玛格丽特的烟和同情非常感激.

sentences.en: Doctors also warn us of nicotine, tar, and many other toxic substances contained in cigarettes.
sentences.cn: 医生也警告我们，香烟含有尼古丁、焦油以及许多其他有毒的物质。

sentences.en: Her voice was raspy with nicotine and whiskey.
sentences.cn: 她因为抽烟喝酒声音变得嘶哑。

sentences.en: His teeth were stained with nicotine from years of smoking.
sentences.cn: 他的牙齿因多年抽烟而被尼古丁染黄了.

sentences.en: If any plants are infested, they can be dipped in a 0.2 % nicotine solution.
sentences.cn: 倘若某些植物受侵扰, 可将它们侵入0.2%尼古丁溶液中.

sentences.en: It allows nicotine to diffuse slowly and steadily into the bloodstream.
sentences.cn: 它能使尼古丁平稳缓慢地渗透到血液里。

sentences.en: Many smokers who are chemically addicted to nicotine cannot cut down easily.
sentences.cn: 许多有尼古丁瘾的抽烟人不容易把烟戒掉.

sentences.en: Nicotine marks stained his chin and fingers.
sentences.cn: 尼古丁渍染黄了他的下巴和手指。

sentences.en: Nicotine produces a feeling of well-being in the smoker.
sentences.cn: 尼古丁给吸烟者带来一种愉悦的感觉。

sentences.en: Nicotinic acetylcholine receptors have many functions, and in the brain are the primary targets of nicotine.
sentences.cn: 尼古丁乙酰胆碱受体有许多作用，在大脑中，它是尼古丁的主要目标。

sentences.en: She had long beautiful hands with fingers stained by nicotine.
sentences.cn: 她有一双修长美丽的手,手指上有尼古丁留下的痕迹.

sentences.en: Smokers who inhale are likely to become addicted to nicotine.
sentences.cn: 吸烟的人容易对尼古丁上瘾.

sentences.en: You are given pills with small quantities of nicotine to wean you from cigarettes.
sentences.cn: 会给你一些含少量尼古丁的药片帮你戒除烟瘾。

trans.tran_en: a substance in tobacco which makes it difficult for people to stop smoking
